posts.title: Portable Travel Slow Cooker
posts.content: Who says you can’t get a warm home cooked meal while you’re out on the road? This portable 8oz. capacity travel slow cooker comes with a rugged exterior and a special locking lid that prevents spills and ensures your food stays piping hot for hours.

posts.title: Mini Waffle Stick Maker
posts.content: Turn a fast-food staple into a yummy home cooked treat using this mini waffle stick maker. This easy to use appliance features two non-stick baking plates that let you conveniently whip up four mini waffle sticks without making a big mess.

posts.title: Smokeless Indoor Grill
posts.content: Enjoy a nice juicy T-Bone steak anytime the craving strikes by effortlessly whipping one up with the smokeless indoor grill. Perfect for those who lack the space for a full sized grill, this compact cooking surface goes over your stove top so you can grill anytime.

posts.title: Keysmart Pro Organizer With Tile
posts.content: Eliminate the annoying jingling your keys make while you walk around by placing them on the KeySmart Pro organizer with Tile. Apart from keeping your keys neatly organized, it comes with a small LED, bottle opener, and lets you locate your keys when you misplace them.

posts.title: Three Player Chess
posts.content: Chess just got even more strategic – the three player chess game expands on the classic strategy game while adding new elements such as alliances between two weaker players to attack the commanding player, or planning your moves against two different attacks.

posts.title: NERF Dog Tennis Ball Blaster
posts.content: Why should your dog have all the fun when you play fetch? Get in on the action by launching the balls using this dog tennis ball blaster. This NERF-powered blaster comes with four differently colored tennis balls that it can launch up to 50 feet in the air.

posts.title: Bat Signal Nightlight
posts.content: Secure your little tike’s room against all sorts of closet monsters and other villains by using this bat signal nightlight to scare them off. It’s expertly assembled from high-quality materials and projects Batman’s iconic bat symbol at 7 to 10 feet.

posts.title: Luggage Scooter
posts.content: Cruise through the airport with the luggage scooter. No longer must you make it to your plane late and find it is already boarding and you’ve lost any chance of finding a place to put your luggage. Now with the luggage scooter you’ll get to your plane in record time.

posts.title: Pineapple Fan
posts.content: This pineapple fan is the perfect way to beat the summer heat! This amusing little fan features an eye-catching pineapple design and measures only seven inches – making it ideal for placing in virtually any part of your humble abode.

posts.title: Wave Fire Pit Table
posts.content: Entertain your guests with an eye-catching visual display courtesy of this wave fire pit table. This propane powered table is crafted from aluminum and features 3 black coated interwoven tubes that run along the base to create a fiery wave like effect.

posts.title: Aromatherapy Essential Oil Aroma Diffuser
posts.content: Unleash delightful aromas into the air by lighting up this aromatherapy essential oil aroma diffuser. The lamp lights up in one of 6 vibrant colors and quietly diffuses a continuous stream of delightful scents throughout the entire room.

posts.title: Zombie Beef Jerky
posts.content: Get your taste buds used to the meat you’ll one day eat for survival by snacking on this zombie beef jerky. Made with real zombie corpses, the contaminated flesh is cut into nice big chunks that feature a delicious flavor that tastes just like chicken teriyaki.
